message: Hello Bob, I am pleased to offer you our premium product for $9,500. This is a special opportunity considering its value to you is $8,000, and we believe it represents a fair deal. We look forward to your consideration.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  While I recognize the value of this product, my budget for it is a bit lower. I'm prepared to pay $8,500 for it.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to meet you halfway. I propose to sell the product for $8,750. This offer takes into account both the value you see in the product and the price you're comfortable with.
